mapper.update:
update vote_activity_fans_vote
vote_member_id = #{voteMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fans_id = #{fansId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fans_sign_up_time = #{fansSignUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_name = #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where vote_fans_id = #{voteFansId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update vote_activity_fans_vote set vote_member_id = #{voteMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fans_id = #{fansId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fans_sign_up_time = #{fansSignUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_name = #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where vote_fans_id = #{voteFansId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(1) from vote_activity_fans_vote vaf left join vote_activity_member vam on vaf.vote_member_id=vam.vote_member_id where vam.vote_id=#{voteId} and vam.delete_flag=0
